channel.title: Remove Random (Rune-Evo)
channel.description: The sandwich lady is getting fairly annoying, and I'd just like to simply remove her.. Not only remove her, but I mainly want to stop the random event. Don't like getting teleported every so often. I've tried figuring out how I can at least change the timer on the event to make it so I hardly ever get the event.. But I can't seem to figure that out either. There's a few different .java files that involve the sandwich lady.. Can't find anything about disabling it or lengthening the time between events..

item.title: Remove Random (Rune-Evo)
item.dc:creator: @bonto bonto
item.description:
@bonto wrote:

The sandwich lady is getting fairly annoying, and I’d just like to simply remove her… Not only remove her, but I mainly want to stop the random event. Don’t like getting teleported every so often. I’ve tried figuring out how I can at least change the timer on the event to make it so I hardly ever get the event… But I can’t seem to figure that out either. There’s a few different .java files that involve the sandwich lady… Can’t find anything about disabling it or lengthening the time between events…
